dct_title_s: An accurate map of Hindostan or India, from the best authorities
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:9,180,000 (E 64째--E 102째/N 36째--N 4째).Relief shown pictorially. Appears in the author's Carey's general atlas, improved and enlarged. 1817. Name burnished out below title, probably J.T. Scott, sculp. In top right margin: 53. Dimensions: 38 x 40 centimeters
dcat_keyword_sm: South Asia Maps Early Works to 1800
